name: Mastery Talisman: Immovable
description:
When Action Phase begins: If your active character is protected by a Shield, create 2 Omni Element and draw 2 cards.
When you play any card: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> If your active character is protected by a $[K6], create 2 $[K411] and draw 2 cards.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play any card:</color> Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> If your active character is protected by a {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>, create 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> and draw 2 cards.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play any card:</color> Spend 2 less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)
